name: Corporated Robots Wars
description:
New RTS-Strategy-Actin game in Cyberpunk style where YOU take control on squad full of robots.
New system of unit control has has a feature for both beginners and experienced players.
Defend your power generators from other company squad and doesn't give them kill your
robots.
ATTENTION (according to contract №[CLASSIFIED] the company does not allocate funds for the construction of additional
military robots during the fiscal year, Have a nice day☺)

Game Features


  • No story, just gameplay and a lot of lasers.
  • Only 1 difficulty levels (Hardcore).
  • Futuristic Levels, Robots, Transport, Power Generator.
  • 5 different levels, each one has individual difficulties and terrain.
  • Not equal fights include according to contract №[CLASSIFIED], Have a nice day☺
